113.content:
One day, Tommy and Chuckie were in Tommy's house, playing with Chuckie's Bogo Block village in the playpen. They were having a good time, when suddenly, Tommy stopped to ask Chuckie a question.

"Chuckie, what's it like to be potty trained?" Tommy asked Chuckie.

"I like being potty-trained. No more sticky diapers or waiting to be changed." Chuckie told Tommy.

"But don't the growed-ups watch you go potty?" Tommy asked Chuckie.

"They do at first, but after a while, they leave you alone. Why do you ask?" Chuckie asked Tommy. Before Tommy could answer, he heard Didi.

"There you are, Tommy." She said. Didi was carrying a potty seat. It wasn't Chuckie's, but it looked a little like it, except it was blue and white. She set the potty down in the playpen.

"Time for your potty check." Didi told Tommy, then she untaped his diaper, which was dry.

"Good boy. You must be excited to learn to use the potty just like Chuckie." Didi told Tommy. She picked him up and sat him down on the potty.

"Now, you be a good boy and stay on your potty. Mommy will be right back to check on you. Maybe Chuckie can help." Didi told Tommy, then she went into the kitchen to throw the diaper away.

"That's why." Tommy told Chuckie.

"Oh. Do you need to go potty?" Chuckie asked Tommy.

"Hmmm, not right now." Tommy told Chuckie. He climbed off his potty, then walked over to the Bogo Block village, not caring that he wasn't wearing his diaper.

"Come on, Chuckie! Let's go back to playing!" Tommy told Chuckie. Chuckie was reluctant upon seeing Tommy diaperless, but decided to go back to playing with him anyway.

What happens next?
113.title: Story 3

choices: Didi takes Tommy and Chuckie outside
Didi holds off on potty-training Tommy
1131.content:
Chuckie reached for the townsperson closest to Tommy, when all of a sudden, he felt a wet spot on the floor. It didn't take long for him to figure out where it came from.

"Uh, Tommy?" Chuckie asked Tommy.

"Yes, Chuckie?" Tommy replied.

"I think you forgetted to go potty in the potty." Chuckie told Tommy, who looked down at the wet spot in front of him.

"Oops. Sorry, Chuckie." Tommy said, feeling a little embarrassed.

Didi walked back into the living room, and was shocked when she saw that Tommy accidentally peed on the floor.

"Oh, dear!" She said, feeling worried.

What happens next?
1131.title: Tommy has to pee

11311.content:
Didi was determined not to give up on potty-training Tommy, so she decided to try a different strategy. She took Tommy, still diaperless, outside along with his potty, as well as Chuckie. This way, if Tommy had another accident, it wouldn't stain the carpet.

"Now, you boys play nicely outside while Mommy cleans the oopsie out of the carpet." Didi told Tommy and Chuckie.

What happens next?
11311.title: Didi takes Tommy and Chuckie outside

113111.content: Does Chuckie try to teach Tommy how to use the potty?
113111.title: Reader's Choice 1

1131111.content:
When Chuckie saw that Didi had also brought his potty outside, he decided to teach Tommy how to use the potty.

"Tommy, do you have to go potty?" Chuckie asked Tommy.

"I don't know." Tommy told Chuckie, feeling unsure. The last time he thought he didn't have to go, he accidentally peed on the floor, so he didn't know if he had to go this time or not.

"You should probably use your potty now before you have another accident." Chuckie told Tommy.

"Good idea, Chuckie." replied Tommy.

"Here, I'll help you." Chuckie said as he brought his potty to Tommy.

"Now, the first thing I do when I need to go potty is take off my pants." Chuckie told Tommy, then he pulled down his pants and underwear. Since Tommy's diaper was already off, he imagined he was wearing it and taking it off.

"Good. Now, the next thing I do is sit on my potty." Chuckie told Tommy, then he sat down on his potty. Tommy then sat down on his potty.

"Then... I... go." Chuckie said nervously as he felt a sudden urge to pee.

"Are you okay, Chuckie?" Tommy asked Chuckie.

"Yes, I'm fine!" Chuckie said nervously. Chuckie didn't like having to go potty for an audience, but he did want a set a good example for his best friend, especially because he wanted Stu and Didi to be proud of Tommy for using his potty. Chuckie closed his eyes and imagined that Tommy wasn't there. Then, he peed into his potty, sighing with relief afterwards. Tommy watched Chuckie and tried to do as he did.

Did Tommy use his potty?
1131111.title: Yes

11311112.content:
Chuckie's bladder was now empty and his potty was full. Chuckie climbed off his full potty, looked inside, and felt proud of himself. Tommy, unfortunately, had no such luck. When he climbed off his potty and looked into it, he saw it was still empty. He began to feel discouraged.

"Uh, Chuckie? I don't think it's working. Nothing came out." Tommy told Chuckie. Chuckie walked over and looked into Tommy's empty potty. Though he was hardly surprised it was empty since Tommy had earlier accidentally peed on the carpet, he was glad that Tommy at least made an attempt to use his potty, so he decided to spare his best friend's feelings.

"Don't worry, Tommy. You can try again whenever you want." Chuckie assured Tommy, who felt better.

"Thanks, Chuckie. Come on, let's go play!" Tommy told Chuckie, and the two toddlers walked over to the sandbox to play in it.

What happens next?
11311112.title: No

choices: Phil and Lil Ask Tommy Why He Isn't Wearing a Diaper

As Didi finished cleaning up the stain on the carpet, the doorbell rang.

"I'll get it!" she said. She ran up to the front door, where Betty had arrived with Phil and Lil.

"Hiya, Deed." Betty said to Didi.

"Oh, hi, Betty. Phil and Lil are going to have to play outside right now." Didi told Betty.

"How come?" Betty asked Didi.

"Tommy had a little accident. I've been trying to potty-train him, and so far, he hasn't used his potty." Didi told Betty as Betty dropped Phil and Lil off in Tommy's backyard.

What happens next?

"My mommy's trying to potty-train me, so she took off my diapie." Tommy told Phil and Lil.

"Why can't you just stay in diapies forever?" Lil asked Tommy.

"Yeah, me and Lillian ain't ever gettin' potty-trained." added Phil.

"Acause my Mommy and Daddy want me to use the potty when I have to pee or poop. Asides, Chuckie's potty-trained and he says it really isn't all that bad." Tommy told Phil and Lil.

"Don't you amember how great diapies are, Tommy? They hold a lot." Phil told Tommy.

"Yeah, if you have to go potty, you can just go in your diapie and keep playing. In fact, I'm doing it right now." said Lil, and she sighed with relief as she wet her diaper. Now, Tommy was confused. Should he join Chuckie in using the potty, or should he go back to wearing diapers with Phil and Lil?

What does Tommy decide to do?

Tommy looked around. He saw the playhouse that Chas built on the other side of the backyard.

"I got a idea, Chuckie. Why don't we go into the playhouse your daddy built? You can use your potty there." Tommy asked Chuckie.

"Okay, Tommy." said Chuckie. He picked up his potty, and the two toddlers went into the playhouse, leaving Tommy's potty outside. Chuckie set down his potty, then he pulled down his pants and underwear and sat down on his potty.

"Do you want me to leave?" Tommy asked Chuckie.

Did Chuckie tell Tommy to leave to give him some privacy?
113112211.title: Look For a Place For Chuckie to Pee in Private

1131122112.content:
Before Chuckie could reply, he started peeing in his potty, then he sighed with relief, not caring that Tommy was watching him. Soon, his bladder was empty and his potty was full. When he was all done, Chuckie climbed off his potty and pulled his pants and underwear back up. Tommy walked up to the full potty and looked inside. He was both impressed and confused.

"Wow, Chuckie! You really had to pee!" Tommy told Chuckie.

"Uh-huh." replied Chuckie.

"But I thought you said you couldn't pee when people are watching you." Tommy told Chuckie.

"Usually I can't, but this time, I really had to pee, so I didn't really care if you was watching or not." Chuckie told Tommy, who was still wondering what it was like to be potty-trained.

"Chuckie, I've been meanin' to ask you, what does being potty-trained feel like?" Tommy asked Chuckie.

"Well, Tommy, it's kind of hard to esplain, but it's better than going in a diaper." Chuckie told Tommy.

"You used to think diapies were better." Tommy reminded Chuckie. Chuckie giggled, as he knew Tommy was right. Back when Chas first started potty-training him, Chuckie didn't want to use the potty, but ever since he first successfully used his potty, he couldn't imagine himself ever going back to wearing diapers.

"I know, Chuckie, but now I don't gots to pee no mores." Tommy told Chuckie.

"There. It's okay if you're not ready to use the potty right now. Just tell Mommy when you are, okay?" She asked him. She then decided to take him and Chuckie somewhere else to play while she cleaned up the stain.

As the boys continued to play, Chuckie suddenly felt a strong urge to pee. Tommy was quick to notice.

"What's wrong, Chuckie?" Tommy asked Chuckie.

"I gotta go potty, but I don't think I can make it to the bathroom in time! Can I use your potty?" Chuckie asked Tommy. Tommy's potty was the closest one available.

Does Tommy let Chuckie use his potty?
1132.title: Chuckie has to pee

choices: No, He Had to Poop as Well.
11321.content:
"Sure, Chuckie. You can use my potty. I don't have to go potty right now anyway." Tommy told Chuckie.

"Oh, thank you, Tommy!" Chuckie exclaimed. He ran over to Tommy's potty, then he pulled down his pants and underwear and sat down on it. He sighed with relief as he peed in it, not caring that Tommy was nearby. It wasn't long before Chuckie's bladder was empty and Tommy's potty was full.

Was Chuckie finished using Tommy's potty?
11321.title: Yes

113211.content:
At last, Chuckie was finished peeing. He climbed off Tommy's potty and pulled his pants and underwear back up.

"Thanks, Tommy." Chuckie told Tommy.

"You're welcome, Chuckie." Tommy said as he walked up to his full potty and looked down at Chuckie's pee inside it.

"Wow, Chuckie! You really had to pee!" Tommy exclaimed. At that moment, Didi returned.

Did she mistake Tommy looking into his full potty for him actually having used it?
113211.title: Yes

1132111.content:
When Didi saw Tommy looking into his full potty, she thought he was the one who peed in it.

"Good boy, Tommy! You went potty all by yourself!" she told Tommy as she pet his head.

Did Tommy feel guilty knowing that he didn't actually pee in his potty?
1132111.title: Yes

11321111.content:
Poor Tommy felt guilty. He knew he didn't actually pee in his potty, but he didn't want Didi to be upset with him if she knew that Chuckie peed in it instead of him. He blushed in embarrassment.

"Mommy will be right back." Didi said as she picked up Tommy's full potty. She went to the bathroom to empty it into the toilet. Chuckie saw how upset Tommy was, so he tried to cheer him up.

"Sorry, Tommy, but I really had to go potty." Chuckie told Tommy.

"I understand, Chuckie, but now my mommy thinks I'm the one who went potty." replied Tommy.

"I know. Thanks for letting me use your potty, though." said Chuckie.

"Well, you are my bestest friend, and I knows how much you like being potty-trained." replied Tommy.

"Well, yeah. I mean, as long as nobody watches me." said Chuckie.

"What am I gonna do, Chuckie? I can't esactly tell my Mommy that you peed in my potty, and neither can you." Tommy told Chuckie.

"I know. It's real hard to talk to the growed-ups." agreed Chuckie.

"Asides, if we could, she probably wouldn't be happy if she knew." said Tommy.

"You're probably right, Tommy." agreed Chuckie.

"We gots to do something, but what?" asked Tommy.

What did Tommy and Chuckie decide to do?

Chas took Chuckie to Tommy's house to play. Tommy and Chuckie were playing in the sandbox in Tommy's backyard, when all of a sudden, Chuckie started squirming uncomfortably. Tommy was quick to notice.

"Tommy, I gotta go potty!" Chuckie told Tommy.

"So go ahead and go, Chuckie. I'll be fine out here." Tommy assured Chuckie. As Tommy wore a diaper, he could go wherever and wherever he wanted.

"Okay, Tommy. I'll be right back." Chuckie assured Tommy, and he ran as fast as he could.

What happens next?

choices: Tommy Tells Chuckie to Take Off His Wet Pants
12212.content:
Chuckie ran as fast as he could, but he didn't get very far. By the time he got to the back porch, he couldn't hold it anymore and began to pee his pants. Tommy gasped when he saw what happened. Poor Chuckie was so upset that he had an accident in front of his best friend that he started crying. Tommy walked up to Chuckie and put his hand on Chuckie's back to calm him down.

"Don't feel bad, Chuckie. Accidents happen." Tommy assured Chuckie.

"Thanks, Tommy." Chuckie said, feeling a little better. He was glad he had a friend like Tommy to comfort him in his time of need, but he still felt wet and uncomfortable.

"What am I gonna do, Tommy? I can't let your mommy and daddy see me like this, they might make me wear a diaper! I can't go back to wearing diapers, I'm potty-trained now! Or at least I was." Chuckie told Tommy.

What happens next?

122121.content:
Tommy thought for a minute, then he got an idea.

"Chuckie, if you don't want to wear your wet pants, why don't you just take them off?" Tommy asked Chuckie.

"But Tommy, I don't want to be half-nakie! It's just not natural!" Chuckie complained. Chuckie was very sensitive about his body.

"Come on, Chuckie, take em off!" Tommy told Chuckie.

"I... I... Oh, I don't know." Chuckie said, feeling very unsure.

"Just think about it, Chuckie. Do you really want to be stuck wearing wet pants for the rest of the day?" Tommy asked Chuckie.

Does Chuckie Take Off His Wet Pants?
122121.title: Tommy Tells Chuckie to Take Off His Wet Pants

1221211.content:
Chuckie thought about what Tommy said. He then remembered when Tommy, Phil, and Lil all took off their clothes to be naked like Spike. They were all happy and didn't judge each other. Chuckie decided he didn't want to wear wet pants, so he decided to take Tommy's advice and take them off.

"Okay, Tommy. I'll do it!" Chuckie told Tommy, and he proceeded to undress himself. First, he kicked off his shoes and socks, then he pulled down his wet pants and underwear and kicked them off. Chuckie was now naked from the waist down, but he was so happy to be out of his wet pants and underwear that he smiled and giggled. He didn't even care that Tommy was watching him undress the entire time.

What happens next?

12212111.content:
Tommy was impressed when he saw Chuckie naked from the waist down.

"Wow, Chuckie! That looks like fun! I wanna try it!" Tommy exclaimed. He then untaped his diaper, which was still dry, sighing with relief as it fell to the ground. Chuckie smiled and giggled. He knew that Tommy took off his diaper so that he wouldn't have to feel silly about being naked from the waist down.

"Come on, Chuckie, let's go back to playtime! Tommy told Chuckie, and the two toddlers walked back to the sandbox, neither one caring that they were naked from the waist down. Chuckie knew that Stu or Didi could be seeing them like this at any time, so he decided he might as well enjoy the moment while it lasted. He giggled as the cool wind tickled his bare bottom.

122121111.content: Stu went outside to check on Tommy and Chuckie. Did he freak out at the sight of them half-naked?

"Don't worry, Deed. I just want to check on the... AAAHHH!" Stu cried at the sight of Tommy and Chuckie naked from the waist down. Didi heard his scream from inside the house.

"Stu, what's wrong?" Didi asked Stu.

"Oh, nothing. Chuckie just took off his pants and Tommy just took off his diaper." Stu told Didi.

"Well, put them back on!" Didi called to Stu.

Stu decided to re-dress Chuckie first. When he picked up Chuckie's pants, he felt how wet they were, and suddenly understood why Chuckie took them off. Stu was now in a perilous situation. He knew that Chas would be coming back to pick Chuckie up soon. He didn't want to send Chuckie home in wet pants, but he also didn't want to send him home half-naked.

122121111121.content: Does Stu try to put a diaper on Chuckie?

When Stu saw Tommy's untaped diaper lying on the ground, he got an idea. He didn't really like the idea of making Chuckie wear a diaper, but he didn't have a lot of options. He went up to Tommy's bedroom and got one of Tommy's clean diapers from the changing table. Then he went back outside and walked up to Chuckie.

"Okay, Chuckie. Let's get this diaper on!" Stu said to Chuckie as he taped the diaper onto his bottom.

"There you go. That'll keep you dressed until till your daddy comes back to pick you up." Stu told Chuckie.

How did Chuckie feel about wearing a diaper?

Didi dropped Chuckie off in Tommy's backyard, where Tommy, Phil and Lil were playing ball.

"There you go, Chuckie. Have fun!" Didi said, then she went into Tommy's house.

"Hey, how you doin', Chuckeroo?" Tommy asked Chuckie.

"Hi, guys." Chuckie said unhappily as he crouched.

"Um, is something wrong, Chuckie?" Tommy asked Chuckie.

"No." Chuckie said nervously.

"Then why are you sitting on the ground all scrunched up like a old bug?" Lil asked Chuckie.

"No reason." Chuckie said nervously.

"Are you hiding something?" Lil asked Chuckie.

"I'm not hiding anything, I just have to go potty!" Chuckie told Lil.

"So why don't you just go?" Phil asked Chuckie.

"I can't go when people are lookin', and I really gotta go right now, but all the growed-ups are watching me every time I go and I really gotta go!" Chuckie complained.

What happens next?
12312.title: When Chuckie First Has To Pee

choices: Decide to Pee on the Tree
123121.content:
"Hey, Chuckie, I got a idea! Why don't you just go on the tree?" Tommy asked Chuckie.

"Once you're potty-trained, you can't go back to stuff like that!" Chuckie told Tommy.

"Why not? Spike does it all the time!" Tommy told Chuckie as Spike walked up to him. Chuckie had a decision to make. Should he go inside where all the adults can see him, or should he be like Spike and pee on the tree?

What does Chuckie do?
123121.title: Tommy Suggests that Chuckie Pee on the Tree

1231212.content:
Chuckie really had to pee, but he didn't want to go inside Tommy's house where all the adults could see him, so he decided to take Tommy's advice and pee on the tree.

"Oh, all right! I'll use the tree, but you guys gotta not look at me, kay?" Chuckie asked Tommy, Phil, and Lil.

"Okay, don't worry, Chuckie. We'll look at this flower!" Tommy told Chuckie, and he, Phil, Lil, and Spike all looked at a nearby flower.

Chuckie walked up to the tree, and was about to pull down his pants and underwear.

Does Didi come out to check on Chuckie?
1231212.title: Decide to Pee on the Tree

choices: Tommy Joins Chuckie in Peeing on the Tree
12312122.content:
Fortunately for Chuckie, Didi was inside, talking to Chas, unaware of what was going on outside. Chuckie pulled down his pants and underwear and proceeded to pee on the tree, sighing with relief, and then giggling.

What happens next?
12312122.title: No

choices: Phil and Lil Join Tommy and Chuckie in Peeing on the Tree
123121221.content:
Tommy decided to check on Chuckie to see if he peed on the tree. He walked up to Chuckie, and when he saw him peeing on the tree, he was impressed.

"Wow, Chuckie! That looks like fun! I want to try it!" Tommy exclaimed. He then untaped his diaper, which was still dry, and let it fall to the ground. Shortly after taking his diaper off, Tommy started peeing on the tree and sighed with relief.

"It feels nice not to need my diapie changed." Tommy said as he continued going pee.

What happens next?
123121221.title: Tommy Joins Chuckie in Peeing on the Tree

As Tommy and Chuckie continued to pee on the tree, Phil and Lil walked up to them and were impressed when they saw them peeing.

"Whoa!" exclaimed Phil.

"Neat!" chimed in Lil.

"Come on, guys, you can do it, too! Just try it, it feels great!" Tommy told Phil and Lil.

Which twin took off their diaper first?

12312122111.content:
"Well, okay." said Phil. He pulled down his pants and untaped his diaper, letting it fall to the ground. Shortly after taking his diaper off, he started peeing on the tree and sighed with relief. Then Lil untaped her diaper and let it fall to the ground. Once it was off, she started peeing on the tree and sighed with relief.

"I feel better already!" Lil exclaimed as she continued going pee.

15211.content:
Dil Pickles had recently celebrated his second birthday. He could now walk all by himself, and he had grown a full head of red hair. Now that he could walk by himself, he was a very hyperactive young toddler. However, because he was the youngest in his group, he was the only one who still wore diapers. His older brother, Tommy, was now three years old, and so were Phil and Lil, the DeVille twins. Chuckie Finster was now four, and his younger sister, Kimi, was three and a half. Angelica, his older cousin, was now five.

How did Dil feel knowing that he was the only one in his group who still wore diapers?

He Could Go Potty Wherever and Whenever He Wanted

152112.title: He Wished He Was Potty-Trained Like His Friends

Dil decided to talk to Tommy on what was like to be potty-trained.

"Tommy, what does it feel like to be potty-trained?" Dil asked Tommy.

15211211.content:
"I like being potty-trained, Dil. No more sticky diapers or having to wait to be changed." Tommy told Dil.

"But I thought you liked wearing diapers." Dil told Tommy.

"Well, I did at first, but when I saw Chuckie using the potty, I rather liked the idea of not needing my diaper changed, so I decided I wanted to use the potty just like Chuckie." Tommy told Dil.

"Don't you ever miss wearing your diapers?" Dil asked Tommy.

"I do sometimes, but then I remember how much better it is to be potty-trained." Tommy told Dil.

"This is the potty. It's very easy to use. First, you take off your diaper, then, you sit down right here, and then you pee or poop in it. When you're all done, you wipe your bottom clean. Do you think you can do it?" Tommy asked Dil.

"Yes, I think so." said Dil.

"Great. First, let's get that diaper off." said Tommy, eyeing Dil's diaper.

153.content: How does Kimi become toilet trained?
153.title: Kimi Finster

1531.content: Did Kimi want to be potty-trained?
1531.title: Story 1

15311.content:
Chuckie liked having Kimi as a little sister, but he didn't always like the things she did. One of the things Kimi would do is follow him into the bathroom whenever he needed to use the toilet. Kimi always wondered what it was like to use the potty, as she wore diapers and needed to be changed.

One afternoon, Kira had just changed Kimi's diaper when Kimi saw Chuckie running to the bathroom. Kimi followed Chuckie inside, much to Chuckie's ire.

"You gotta stop following me in here, Kimi. Sometimes a just needs his piracy!" Chuckie told Kimi.

"I'm sorry, Chuckie. It's just... I..." Kimi stammered.

"What, Kimi? What's so important that you gotta follow me into the bathroom?" Chuckie asked Kimi.

"I just want to know what it's like to use the potty is all." Kimi told Chuckie.

"Oh." Chuckie said meekly. He now felt bad about snapping at Kimi, and was actually glad she showed interest in being potty-trained.

"Well, Kimi. I like being potty-trained. No more sticky diapers or waiting to be changed." Chuckie told Kimi.

"But don't the growed-ups watch you?" Kimi asked Chuckie.

"Well, they do at first, but after a while, they leave you alone." Chuckie assured Kimi.

Does Chuckie try to teach Kimi how to use the potty?
15311.title: Yes

153111.content:
"Would you like to learn how to use the potty today?" Chuckie asked Kimi.

"Uh-huh!" Kimi said excitedly.

"Okay." Chuckie said, and he got out his old clown potty for Kimi to use.

"Here, Kimi. You can use my old potty. Since I started going potty on the toilet, I hardly ever use it anymore." Chuckie told Kimi, then he began to teach her how to use the potty.

"Now, the first thing I do when I need to use the potty is take off my pants." Chuckie told Kimi, and he pulled down his pants and underwear. Kimi then untaped her diaper.

"Good. Now, the next thing I do sit it on the potty." Chuckie told Kimi, and he sat on the toilet. Kimi then sat on Chuckie's potty.

"Then... I... go... potty." Chuckie said nervously. Kimi was quick to notice.

"What's wrong, Chuckie?" Kimi asked Chuckie.

"Nothing, Kimi. I'm fine!" Chuckie told Kimi. Chuckie didn't like having to go potty for an audience, but he wanted to set a good example for his little sister. He closed his eyes and imagined Kimi wasn't in the bathroom with him. Then he sighed with relief as he peed into the toilet. Kimi watched Chuckie and tried to use his potty.

Does Kimi use Chuckie's potty?
153111.title: Yes

1531112.content:
Kimi sat on Chuckie's potty, but nothing came out. She stood up, looked into Chuckie's empty potty, and began to feel discouraged. Chuckie flushed the toilet, then climbed off it and pulled his pants and underwear back up.

"Chuckie, I don't think it's working. Nothing's coming out." Kimi told Chuckie.

"Oh. Sorry, Kimi." Chuckie said to Kimi as he washed his hands. Suddenly, he thought of something.

"Wait a minute, Kimi. Didn't your mommy just change your diaper?" He asked Kimi.

"Uh-huh." Kimi told Chuckie.

"Then you probably don't need to go potty right now." Chuckie told Kimi, who still felt discouraged.

"Don't feel bad, Kimi. You can try again whenever you want." Chuckie assured Kimi.

"Thanks, Chuckie." Kimi said, feeling a little better.

"Now let's put your diaper back on." Chuckie told Kimi. Kimi pulled up her dress and held still as Chuckie taped her diaper back onto her bottom.

"Good. Now let's wash your hands and then we can play whatever you want." Chuckie told Kimi. Kimi washed her hands, and then she and Chuckie went into their bedroom to play together.

What happens next?
1531112.title: No

15311121.content: Someone came over to the Finsters' house to play with Chuckie and Kimi. Who was it?
15311121.title: Reader's Choice 1

1531112121.content:
The doorbell rang and Kira answered the door. Charlotte arrived with Angelica.

"Hi, Kira. Thanks for volunteering to watch Angelica while I work today." Charlotte told Kira.

"No problem, Charlotte. You know Angelica is always welcome in our house." replied Kira.

"Bye-bye, Angelica. Mommy will be back soon. Be good for Mr. and Mrs. Finster, okay?" Charlotte asked Angelica.

"Okay, Mommy. I will." Angelica said to Charlotte, then Charlotte left. Kira took Angelica to Chuckie and Kimi's bedroom to play.

"Now, you play nicely with Chuckie and Kimi." Kira told Angelica.

"I will, Mrs. Finster." Angelica said to Kira as Kira left for the kitchen. As soon as Kira was out of earshot, Angelica groaned. She hated babies and dreaded having to spend the day with Chuckie and Kimi.

"Hello, Finster, hello, Shorty." Angelica said unenthusiastically to Chuckie and Kimi.

"Hi, Angelica." Kimi said to Angelica. Suddenly, Angelica sniffed. Usually around this time, Kimi had used her diaper and needed to be changed, but today, she smelled clean.

"Hey, Shorty, why haven't you used your diaper?" Angelica asked Kimi.

"My mommy just changed me before you came here. Asides, Chuckie's teaching me how to use the potty today." Kimi told Angelica. Angelica was shocked when she heard this. She knew that once Kimi was potty-trained, she would stop wearing diapers, and she couldn't call her a dumb baby anymore. She also knew the same thing would eventually happen to Phil, Lil, and Tommy. As much as she hated babies, Angelica took delight in tormenting them, so she decided to keep Kimi in diapers for as long as she could.

How does she do this?
1531112121.title: Yes

15311121211.content:
Angelica looked around. When she saw one of Kimi's clean diapers on Kimi's changing table, she got an idea. She picked it up and taped it on over her tights.

"So, Kimi, I heard you're going to use the potty today." Angelica told Kimi as she walked up to her. Kimi was surprised when she saw Angelica wearing one of her diapers.

"Angelica, why are you wearing one of my diapies?" Kimi asked Angelica.

"Kimi, why waste all your time learning how to use the potty? When you wear a diaper, you can go potty wherever and whenever you want." Angelica told Kimi, and she sighed with relief as she pretended to use the diaper she was wearing.

Did seeing Angelica pretend to use her diaper make Kimi have to use the potty?
15311121211.title: Reader's Choice 1

153111212111.content: Did Kimi have to pee or poop?
153111212111.title: Yes

15311122.content: Was it time for Chuckie and Kimi to take a nap?
15311122.title: Reader's Choice 2

choices: Kimi Wakes Up Dry But Desperate
153111221.content:
Just then, Kira came in, carrying a tray with two sippy cups filled with warm milk.

"Chuckie, Kimi, it's time for your nap. I brought you some warm milk to help you fall asleep." Kira told Chuckie and Kimi. The two toddlers drank their milk down to the last drop. As soon as they were finished, Kira tucked Kimi into her crib and Chuckie into his bed. She kissed them both on their foreheads.

"Sweet dreams." Kira said to Chuckie and Kimi, and the two toddlers fell asleep. About an hour later, Kimi woke up.

Did she wake up wet, or was she dry but needed to use the potty?
153111221.title: Yes

1531112211.content: Kimi woke up wet. Did she call for someone to change her diaper?
1531112211.title: Kimi Wakes Up Wet

choices: No, She Had to Poop as Well
1531112212.content:
To her relief, Kimi's diaper was still dry, but now she really had to pee. Chuckie was still asleep, and she didn't want to wake him up, so she decided to go to the bathroom by herself. She climbed out of her crib and ran to the bathroom, relieved to find that the door was open and there was no one inside. Kimi closed the door, then she untaped her diaper and sat down on Chuckie's potty. As soon as her cheeks touched the seat, she started peeing and sighed with relief. She peed until her bladder was empty and Chuckie's potty was full.

After she stopped peeing, was Kimi finished using Chuckie's potty?
1531112212.title: Kimi Wakes Up Dry But Desperate

15311122121.content:
At that moment, Chuckie woke up. He needed to use the toilet. He got out of his bed and ran to the bathroom. When he opened the door, he was surprised to see that Kimi had just gotten off his potty. He looked inside and saw that she peed in it. He was very proud of her.

"Good girl, Kimi, you went potty all by yourself!" Chuckie told Kimi, and he gave her a hug. He then picked up her untaped diaper.

"All right, now let's put your diaper back on." said Chuckie. Kimi pulled up her dress and held still as Chuckie taped her diaper back onto her bottom. After that, Kimi went to the sink to wash her hands.

"Excuse me, Kimi, I need to go potty now." said Chuckie.

"Okay, Chuckie." said Kimi, and she left to give him some privacy while he used the toilet.

What happens next?
15311122121.title: Yes

153111221211.content: Somebody came over to the Finster house to play with Chuckie and Kimi. Who was it?
153111221211.title: Somebody Comes Over

choices: "I liked it. It felt nice not to need my diapie changed."
"It was okay. I still prefer to use my diapies."
1531112212111.content:
Just then, the doorbell rang.

"I'll get it!" said Kira, and she answered the door. Didi had arrived with Tommy.

"Hi, Didi. Come on in." said Kira. Didi came in and set Tommy down in the playpen, where Chuckie and Kimi now were. She then went into the kitchen to talk to Kira.

"Hi, Tommy. How are you feeling today?" Chuckie asked Tommy.

"Oh, I feel great, Chuckie. My Mommy changed my diapie afore we came here, so I feel all nice and clean." Tommy told Chuckie.

"That's great, Tommy. You know, just afore you came here, Kimi used the potty all by herself!" Chuckie told Tommy.

"Really?" Tommy asked Kimi.

"Uh-huh." said Kimi.

"Wow, Kimi! That's great! Now you're just like your big brother! How did it feel to use the potty?" Tommy asked Kimi.

What did Kimi tell Tommy?
1531112212111.title: Tommy

15312.content: What did Kimi do about it?
15312.title: No

1531211.content: Where did Kimi run away to?
1531211.title: Yes

1532.title: Story 2

15321.content: Did they take off all of her clothes?
15321.title: Yes

153212.title: Just her diaper

154.content: how does Susie become fully trained?
154.title: Susie Carmichael

1541.content: Since Susie was three when she first met Tommy, will this story be set before Susie moved into Tommy's neighborhood?
1541.title: Story 1

15411.content: Does this take place in Susie's old house, when Susie is 2, Alisa is 14, Buster is 9, and Edwin is 5?
15411.title: Yes

154111.content: Were Susie's parents and older siblings trying to potty-train Susie so they could move into the new house they bought quicker?
154111.title: Yes

choices: Excited, She Couldn't Wait to Learn to Use the Potty
Horrified, She Didn't Want to Stop Wearing Diapers
1541111.content:
One year before the Carmichaels moved to Tommy's neighborhood, they lived in an apartment building. Because of how small it was, Alisa and Buster had to share one bedroom, while Edwin and Susie had to share another. Susie's siblings often quarreled with each other because they had to share bedrooms, and both Randy and Lucy longed for they day when they could move to a bigger and better house where each sibling had their own bedroom.

One day, 14-year-old Alisa was talking to her friend Rebecca on her cell phone, 9-year old Buster was practicing playing soccer, 5-year-old Edwin was working on a science experiment, and 2-year-old Susie was playing with one of her Cynthia dolls. As Lucy was studying her medical practice and Randy was writing a new script for The Dummi Bears, the phone rang.

"I'll get it!" said Lucy.

"Hello?" she said after she picked up the phone. She then walked over to Randy.

"It's for you." Lucy said to Randy.

"Thank you, Lucy." said Randy. After a brief conversation, Randy found out it was Paul Gatsby, his boss and the creator of The Dummi Bears. Paul called to tell Randy that he was very impressed with how millions of viewers saw the latest episode of The Dummi Bears that he wrote, and his script earned his company so much money, that he's going to buy them a bigger and better house to show his appreciation. He found one on the market that the Peytons had just recently moved out of, right across the street from a married couple who had just been blessed with a new baby boy. After he finished the phone call, Randy called everyone over to the kitchen for a family meeting.

"Everyone, I have wonderful news." Randy said to the rest of his family.

"What is it?" asked Lucy.

"You know that bigger and better house we've always wanted? Well, we're finally going to get it!" Randy told his family.

"You're kidding!" said Alisa.

"No, I'm not. Mr. Gatsby liked my latest script so much that he bought us a bigger and better house. No longer will any of you have to share bedrooms, you'll now each have your own." Randy told his family.

"Oh, dad! That's great!" said Alisa.

"Sure is!" agreed Buster.

"Now, before we start packing, there's something important we need to get out of the way; I think it would be a really good idea if we got Susie potty-trained before the big move." Randy told his family. Lucy agreed with him, as it would be such a relief to both of them to no longer have to change any diapers. Susie was good at many things despite being only two years old, but she wasn't potty-trained yet.

How did Susie feel about being potty-trained?
1541111.title: Yes

info.brief_description: A Story brought back from the dead to life. Train your Favorite babies to use the potty!
info.description:
This story was once someone else's, but it was sadly deleted for some reason 6 years ago, i believe.

Just follow these rules.

1.Keep it clean.
2. Diaper changes are allowed.
3. no weight gain
4. pooping and peeing in the diaper or training toilet is one of the main focuses.
5. Have fun!
